item.title: The unanswered questions about women’s role in religion-based politics. [ thedailystar ]
The unanswered questions about women’s role in religion-based politics. [ thedailystar ]
item.description: In 2022, many in Bangladesh were stunned when Shila, a woman in her sixties, assaulted a young girl for wearing jeans and a crop top at the Narsingdi Railway Station. How could a woman publicly assault another woman over her choice of clothing? At the time, it seemed like a shocking aberration.

item.title: 16 Days of Activism to a lifetime of justice. [ en ]
Uncertain politics, unsettling economy. [ thedailystar ]
item.description: Bangladesh's much-anticipated parliamentary elections are scheduled for next February. And they could not have come at a more fraught time for the country. More than 16 months have passed since the interim administration took office, and unofficial estimates indicate a downward trend in the government's approval ratings.
